Luxury Appliance Repair in Thousand Oaks

Premium In-Home Service for the Finest Appliances

Nestled between the Santa Monica Mountains and the rolling hills of Ventura County, Thousand Oaks is known for its elegance, comfort, and attention to detail. In homes where the kitchen is both a gathering place and a gourmet workspace, luxury appliances play a central role in daily life. When they need expert care, there’s only one name to trust.

At Luxury Appliance Repair by Zaricci, we offer white-glove appliance repair services in Thousand Oaks, specializing in high-end brands like Sub-Zero, Wolf, Thermador, Viking, Gaggenau, Miele, La Cornue, and more. Our certified technicians deliver fast, discreet, and professional service tailored to the expectations of discerning homeowners.

🔧 Why Homeowners in Thousand Oaks Trust ZARICCI

  • ✅ Certified Experts in High-End Brands
    Our technicians are trained in the latest technologies and best practices for servicing luxury brands, including smart systems, convection cooking, dual-fuel units, and custom panel designs.
  • ✅ Genuine Manufacturer Parts
    We use only OEM parts to protect your appliance’s longevity, maintain warranty coverage, and ensure your repair meets factory-level standards.
  • ✅ Same-Day & Next-Day Availability
    We offer priority scheduling in Thousand Oaks and surrounding communities, so you don’t have to wait days for service.
  • ✅ White-Glove In-Home Experience
    From protective gear to spotless clean-up, we treat your home and appliances with the same care and precision they were built with.

🛠️ Luxury Appliances We Repair

❄️ Refrigerators & Freezers

  • Sub-Zero, Miele, Viking, Thermador
  • Temperature control problems
  • Ice maker & water dispenser issues
  • Noises, leaks, or frost buildup

🔥 Ranges, Ovens & Cooktops

  • Wolf, La Cornue, Gaggenau, BlueStar
  • Igniter failure or gas burner issues
  • Oven not heating or cooking unevenly
  • Convection and steam oven malfunctions

🚿 Dishwashers

  • Miele, Bosch, Smeg
  • Poor drainage or cleaning
  • Leaking or control panel failures
  • Cycle errors and drying issues

🧺 Washers & Dryers

  • Miele, LG Signature, Fisher & Paykel
  • Drum not spinning or draining
  • Dryer not heating or overheating
  • Smart sensor and display issues

🌬️ Built-In & Integrated Appliances

  • Wine fridges, warming drawers, espresso machines, ventilation systems
  • Performance calibration
  • Sensor or panel replacements
  • Cosmetic restoration

👨‍🔧 Our Process – Designed for Luxury Living

  1. Book Your Appointment
    Schedule by phone or online. Our team will confirm availability and gather key details.
  2. On-Time Arrival & Diagnosis
    Your technician arrives on time, in uniform, and ready to assess the issue with specialized tools and care.
  3. Clear, Upfront Quote
    We provide a detailed quote for your review—covering labor, OEM parts, and timeline.
  4. Expert Repair & Testing
    We perform the repair with precision, run full diagnostics, and ensure everything is functioning like new.
  5. Satisfaction Guaranteed
    We clean the workspace, test the appliance, and back our work with a warranty for your peace of mind.
